entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
